## Differential control of ciliary arrests vs. re-beat

::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
![](images/Ctenophore/SSN_Q12_Q34aboral.png)
![](images/Ctenophore/four_balancers.png){height=8em}
::: 
::: {.column width="40%"}
<br>

```{r}
#| fig-asp: 1

library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

df_time_dif <- read_csv("images/Ctenophore/arrest_rebeat_time_differences.csv")

df_time_dif |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = response, y = time)) +  
  geom_boxplot(aes(fill = plane), size = 0.5, 
               outlier.shape = NA) +
  labs(y = "Time difference (sec)") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_text(size=20),
    legend.text = element_text(size=22),
    legend.position = "inside",
    legend.position.inside = c(0.8, 0.75),
    axis.text = element_text(size=20),
    axis.title = element_text(size=22)
     ) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("sagittal" = "gray70", 
               "tentacular" = "white")
               )

```
